column1: === Climate ===
Huambo features a subtropical highland climate (Köppen: Cwb)
column2: with a wet season from October through April and a dry season between May and September. Despite its location in the tropics
column3: due to its high altitude
column4: Huambo features spring-like temperatures throughout the course of the year
column5: a characteristic common among cities with this climate. The city sees plentiful precipitation during the course of the year
column6: averaging nearly 1500 mm of rain. Temperatures in Huambo are only slightly higher than in city of Pretoria located almost 2000 km further south-east.
